short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically reply to emails after working hours.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay professional and responsive, even outside of working hours. The SmartOn Auto-Reply extension automatically sends tailored replies to incoming emails when you're off the clock. Set your preferred working hours, customize your auto-response, and let the extension handle the rest. Whether you're winding down for the day or enjoying a weekend break, ensure your contacts receive timely responses without any manual effort. Install SmartOn Auto-Reply and enhance your email communication effortlessly.
